name: Lily
description: Lily AI is eCommerce connecting retailer or brand's shoppers with products they may want to buy, through algorithmic solutions like product search and discovery. They raised a $26M Series B in August 2022.

name: OpenCommerce Group
description: OpenCommerce Group is a cross-border eCommerce for Vietnamese SMEs to bring products to global markets. The company announced a $7M Series A funding round in February 2022.

name: NextUser
description: NextUser offers marketing optimization tools for ecommerce businesses to increase personalization across channels and boost ROI. The company has raised more than $2.8M+ in funding.

name: Moovin
description: Moovin is a B2B provider of last-mile deliveries, as well as of full ecommerce storage and fulfillment services, offering integrations with apps like Shopify. They have raised more than USD $4M to date.

name: Bloomcart
description: Bloomcart is a try-before-you-buy eCommerce platform where customers try on the clothes they ordered before having to pay for them. They announced receiving pre-seed funding in October 2021.
